markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Chosen of Lamashtu](/Feats.aspx?ID=1003) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
worshipper of [Lamashtu](/Deities.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

You bear the favor and blessings of [Lamashtu](/Deities.aspx?ID=11), the Mother of Monsters. She has bestowed a mutation upon you, granting you the benefits of another heritage. Choose one goblin heritage that you do not already have; you gain that heritage and its benefits.
name: Chosen of Lamashtu
